article_title: Congressional hopeful Tisei faces different race this time

article_metadata.author: Christian M. Wade Statehouse Reporter

og.description: BOSTON - Two years ago, Richard Tisei came within a few thousand votes of unseating Democratic Congressman John Tierney in an expensive race fought in the shadows of a scandal
